segments.text: I heard that EDD has special services to help me get a job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: callous is a great Internet-based placement service that is available to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don â€™ t have access to a computer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is an area at the EDD Center that is set up with computers for you to make use of .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else at the EDD offices to help me with my job search ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can provide you with information that will help you understand what is available . We also provide workshops .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I go to EDD in person , what type of workshops might I find there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our two most important workshops are Resume Writing and Interviewing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are some other places where I might look for work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Job fairs are popular places to look for work .
segments.speaker: S2
